aws_config_organization_custom_rule.description: Manages a Config Organization Custom Rule

trigger_types.description: List of notification types that trigger AWS Config to run an evaluation for the rule. Valid values: `ConfigurationItemChangeNotification`, `OversizedConfigurationItemChangeNotification`, and `ScheduledNotification`

excluded_accounts.description: List of AWS account identifiers to exclude from the rule

input_parameters.description: A string in JSON format that is passed to the AWS Config Rule Lambda Function

maximum_execution_frequency.description: The maximum frequency with which AWS Config runs evaluations for a rule, if the rule is triggered at a periodic frequency. Defaults to `TwentyFour_Hours` for periodic frequency triggered rules. Valid values: `One_Hour`, `Three_Hours`, `Six_Hours`, `Twelve_Hours`, or `TwentyFour_Hours`.

resource_id_scope.description: Identifier of the AWS resource to evaluate

resource_types_scope.description: List of types of AWS resources to evaluate

tag_key_scope.description: Tag key of AWS resources to evaluate

tag_value_scope.description: Tag value of AWS resources to evaluate

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule
